title: #112: Dark Science with Eddie Pepitone
description: Thank you for tuning for another bizarro episode of Tin Foil Hat with Sam Tripoli.  This episode Sam and Ryan welcome stand up comics Eddie Pepitone to the show to discuss the dark history of the US Military and Government science experiments over the years.  I think we scared Eddie.  Thank you so much for your support.
